## Checklist

- [ ] Code builds without errors (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Lint and TypeScript checks pass (`npm run lint` and `npm run typecheck`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] Accessibility checks pass if UI changed (`npm run a11y`)
- [ ] Updated docs or README if behavior changed
- [ ] Verified changes locally with `npm run dev`
